entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
